Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: walter a ardon
Reviews.Content: my daughter is enjoying this laptop, she was exited to go to college and have the right tool. thank you................

Reviews.Title: Nice one!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Coniks"
Reviews.Content: Some minor issues with speed of mouse and a shift key spring minor sensitivity that is lacking. But otherwise, just right for school and internet surfing. Still adapting to Windows 8, but finding my way around it is getting easier now. I bought a refurbished model, and that saved me a tidy penny or a thousand. Really chuffed with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Computer
Reviews.Author: merl a yusten
Reviews.Content: I like the price for the features included. It has a Window 8.1, nontouch screen. I'd like it a little bit better if it had a DVD.

Reviews.Title: Okay
Reviews.Author: M. K. Seeger "Karen"
Reviews.Content: It works.  Had acer programming on it, which I do not care for.  The mouse rambles and wanders, no CD drive, no Microsoft word.  But is does get the internet and work.

16:9 Aspect Ratio, 16-Inch widescreen, Backlight Technology LED

Bluetooth 4.0, built in webcam, SD card,Built-In Speaker, Touchpad, Security Lock Slot, Standard Keyboard, Numeric Keypad, Integrated Microphone.
ProductInfo.Name: Gateway NE52207u 16- Inch Laptop (1.4 GHz AMD E1-2500 Dual Core processor, 4GB DDR3 system memory, 750GB SATA hard drive, Windows 8)
